r.d: PHP extension for reading RAR archives using bundled unRAR library.
r.n: Changes in this version: - Merge changes made to unrar up to version 4.2.2. - Fix leak in PHP >= 5.3.11 (except 5.4.0) and compile error in master. - Fix some tests failing if TZ != Europe/Lisbon. - Fix bad pointer in an error message. - Added test for bug #59939 (can't reproduce).
